title: U.S. Curling Chief Resigns in Furor Over Handling of Past Abuse Complaints
description: Jeff Plush, the chief executive of curling’s national federation, stepped down after athletes complained about his role in failing to address abuse in women’s soccer when he worked there.
dc:creator: Juliet Macur

media:content.media:description: Jeff Plush resigned Friday as the chief executive of U.S.A. Curling.
